channel.title: Text on Titanium Racing
channel.description: Recent content in Text on Titanium Racing

item.title: Titanium Racing announces our brand new concept car designs
item.description:
If you have been following our progress with the wind tunnel, you will be excited to learn that we have started to work on concepts for our car design.

For our first concept design, we have optly named it “TRONE”: the “TR” stands for Titanium Racing, and ONE is because it is our first concept. The front wing is short and pointy to give maximum aerodynamics down the 20 metre straight track. The back wing and sidepods are joined up to conserve weight for faster acceleration.

item.title: Wind Tunnel Progress
item.description:
An important part of our engineering work is testing so that we can improve our car’s design. We have lots of good ideas about aerodynamics from real F1, but we also need see if those ideas work in reality. We have started to build a wind tunnel that will help us to see how our car will perform.

You can see above that we have created a strong frame for our wind tunnel. Soon we will attach the shell, windows, and fan and then seal it.

item.title: Our Website is Live!
item.description: Our new website is live. We are looking forward to sharing our work on Titanium Racing with you.
